answers.answer: Hello,Such kind or itchy skin can be due to psoriasis, dermatitis, lice, scabies and hives, internal diseases like liver and kidney disorders,diabetes, iron deficiency anemia, irritation and allergic reactions to chemicals,wool,soaps,cosmetics and certain foods  .You can apply an anti-itch cream or lotion to the affected area.
